JOB DESCRIPTION: Your Role    Month 1-3:   Training: Software Testers will be exposed to a mixture of theoretical and practical training which includes training on HTML, CSS, Terminology of testing, Types of testing, Testing life Cycle.    Month 4+:   Advanced training plus project execution experience,   based on performance, ability, and company requirements, certain candidates will then be trained in: Core Testing.   Your Background   You will be reporting to your Buddy/ Manager at Axioned. Should be good in preparing test cases. Should be able to speak average English. Should be a quick learner and interested in learning new technologies. Honest, modest, friendly, patient & above all Team Player. Eager, eager, Eager to always learn and better your skills and yourself. Eager to find a company where you can grow and become a tester.
